description: The AES algorithm is not considered secure anymore due to the advancements in quantum computers. It's recommended to use a more secure algorithm such as AES-256.

description: The use of BigInteger in cryptography is not recommended as it may lead to vulnerabilities such as side-channel attacks or integer overflows.
recommendation: Avoid using BigInteger in cryptography and instead use secure random number generators to generate random values.
